Since this week's topic is Strategy & Technology, the online readings and assignments will be about companies that have had remarkable successes using Technology as part of their Business Strategy. They are Amazon, Netflix, and Zara, and the chapters â€¦
entry.content:
Lecture Slides

  • Lecture 2: Strategy & Technology

Readings

Textbook: Chapters 3, 4, 7

Since this week's topic is Strategy & Technology, the online readings and assignments will be about companies that have had remarkable successes using Technology as part of their Business Strategy. They are Amazon, Netflix, and Zara, and the chapters listed above discuss their strategies in details.

Articles: "Strategy and Internet" by Michael Porter, 2001

Required: section "Six Principles of Strategic Positioning"

  • "How competitive forces shape strategy" by Michael Porter, 1979

This article is optional

Video

  • Porter's Five Forces for Small Businesses
